content: I'm also tempted to slash some of the validators that are pending exit since that's an odd little corner case that doesn't get tested often.  Possibly also save up a slashing condition for a validator that has exited but isn't yet withdrawable and one that is withdrawable already (I don't think that's valid but interesting to see if we can break block production for some clients)
